verses.verse: The lot <S%H1486><s%> for the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> according to their families <S%H4940><s%> was to the border <S%H1366><s%> of Edom, <S%H123><s%> even to the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Zin <S%H6790><s%> southward, <S%H5045><s%> at the uttermost part <S%H7097><s%> of the south. <S%H8486><s%>

Their south <S%H5045><s%> border <S%H1366><s%> was from the uttermost part <S%H7097><s%> of the Salt <S%H4417><s%> Sea, <S%H3220><s%> from the bay <S%H3956><s%> that looks <S%H6437><s%> southward; <S%H5045><s%>

and it went out <S%H3318><s%> southward <S%H5045><s%> of the ascent <S%H5045><s%> of Akrabbim, <S%H4610><s%> and passed <S%H5674><s%> along to Zin, <S%H6790><s%> and went up <S%H5927><s%> by the south of Kadesh Barnea, <S%H6947><s%> and passed <S%H5674><s%> along by Hezron, <S%H2696><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> to Addar, <S%H146><s%> and turned about <S%H5437><s%> to Karka; <S%H7173><s%>

and it passed <S%H5674><s%> along to Azmon, <S%H6111><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> at the brook <S%H5158><s%> of Egypt; <S%H4714><s%> and the border <S%H1366><s%> ended <S%H8444><s%> at the sea. <S%H3220><s%> This shall be your south <S%H5045><s%> border. <S%H1366><s%>

The east <S%H6924><s%> border <S%H1366><s%> was the Salt <S%H4417><s%> Sea, <S%H3220><s%> even to the end <S%H7097><s%> of the Jordan. <S%H3383><s%> The border <S%H1366><s%> of the north <S%H6828><s%> quarter <S%H6285><s%> was from the bay <S%H3956><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%> at the end <S%H7097><s%> of the Jordan. <S%H3383><s%>

The border <S%H1366><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> to Beth Hoglah, <S%H1031><s%> and passed <S%H5674><s%> along by the north <S%H6828><s%> of Beth Arabah; <S%H1026><s%> and the border <S%H1366><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> to the stone <S%H68><s%> of Bohan <S%H932><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben. <S%H7205><s%>

The border <S%H1366><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> to Debir <S%H1688><s%> from the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Achor, <S%H5911><s%> and so northward, <S%H6828><s%> looking <S%H6437><s%> toward Gilgal, <S%H1537><s%> that is over against <S%H5227><s%> the ascent <S%H4608><s%> of Adummim, <S%H131><s%> which is on the south side <S%H5045><s%> of the river. <S%H5158><s%> The border <S%H1366><s%> passed <S%H5674><s%> along to the waters <S%H4325><s%> of En Shemesh, <S%H5885><s%> and ended <S%H8444><s%> at En Rogel. <S%H5883><s%>

The border <S%H1366><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> by the valley <S%H1516><s%> of the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hinnom <S%H2011><s%> to the side <S%H3802><s%> of the Jebusite <S%H2983><s%> southward <S%H5045><s%> (the same is Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>); and the border <S%H1366><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> to the top <S%H7218><s%> of the mountain <S%H2022><s%> that lies before <S%H6440><s%> the valley <S%H1516><s%> of Hinnom <S%H2011><s%> westward, <S%H3220><s%> which is at the farthest part <S%H7097><s%> of the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Rephaim <S%H7497><s%> northward. <S%H6828><s%>

The border <S%H1366><s%> extended <S%H8388><s%> from the top <S%H7218><s%> of the mountain <S%H2022><s%> to the spring <S%H4599><s%> of the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Nephtoah, <S%H5318><s%> and went out <S%H3318><s%> to the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Mount <S%H2022><s%> Ephron; <S%H6085><s%> and the border <S%H1366><s%> extended <S%H8388><s%> to Baalah <S%H1173><s%> (the same is Kiriath Jearim <S%H7157><s%>);

and the border <S%H1366><s%> turned <S%H5437><s%> about from Baalah <S%H1173><s%> westward <S%H3220><s%> to Mount <S%H2022><s%> Seir, <S%H8165><s%> and passed <S%H5674><s%> along to the side <S%H3802><s%> of Mount <S%H2022><s%> Jearim <S%H3297><s%> on the north <S%H6828><s%> (the same is Chesalon <S%H3693><s%>), and went down <S%H3381><s%> to Beth Shemesh, <S%H1053><s%> and passed along <S%H5674><s%> by Timnah; <S%H8553><s%>

and the border <S%H1366><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> to the side <S%H3802><s%> of Ekron <S%H6138><s%> northward; <S%H6828><s%> and the border <S%H1366><s%> extended <S%H8388><s%> to Shikkeron, <S%H7942><s%> and passed along <S%H5674><s%> to Mount <S%H2022><s%> Baalah, <S%H1173><s%> and went out <S%H3318><s%> at Jabneel; <S%H2995><s%> and the goings out <S%H3318><s%> of the border <S%H1366><s%> were at the sea. <S%H3220><s%>

The west <S%H3220><s%> border <S%H1366><s%> was to the shore <S%H5439><s%> of the great <S%H1419><s%> sea. <S%H3220><s%> This is the border <S%H1366><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> according to their families. <S%H4940><s%>

To Caleb <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jephunneh <S%H3312><s%> he gave <S%H5414><s%> a portion <S%H2506><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> according <S%H413><s%> to the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> to Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> even Kiriath <S%H7151><s%> Arba, <S%H704><s%> named after the father <S%H1><s%> of Anak <S%H6061><s%> (the same is Hebron <S%H2275><s%>).

Caleb <S%H3612><s%> drove <S%H3423><s%> out the three <S%H7969><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> of Anak: <S%H6061><s%> Sheshai, <S%H8344><s%> and Ahiman, <S%H289><s%> and Talmai, <S%H8526><s%> the children <S%H3211><s%> of Anak. <S%H6061><s%>
He went up <S%H5927><s%> against the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Debir: <S%H1688><s%> now the name <S%H8034><s%> of Debir <S%H1688><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> was Kiriath Sepher. <S%H7158><s%>

Caleb <S%H3612><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "He who strikes <S%H5221><s%> Kiriath Sepher, <S%H7158><s%> and takes <S%H3920><s%> it, <S%H5414><s%> to him will I give Achsah <S%H5915><s%> my daughter <S%H1323><s%> as wife. <S%H802><s%>"

Othniel <S%H6274><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kenaz, <S%H7073><s%> the brother <S%H251><s%> of Caleb, <S%H3612><s%> took <S%H3920><s%> it: <S%H5414><s%> and he gave him Achsah <S%H5915><s%> his daughter <S%H1323><s%> as wife. <S%H802><s%>

It happened, <S%H935><s%> when she came, that she had <S%H5496><s%> him ask <S%H7592><s%> her father <S%H1><s%> for a field. <S%H7704><s%> She got off <S%H6795><s%> of her donkey, <S%H2543><s%> and Caleb <S%H3612><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "What do you want?"

She said, <S%H559><s%> "Give <S%H5414><s%> me a blessing. <S%H1293><s%> Because you have set <S%H5414><s%> me in the land <S%H776><s%> of the South, <S%H5045><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> me also springs <S%H1543><s%> of water. <S%H4325><s%>" He gave <S%H5414><s%> her the upper <S%H5942><s%> springs <S%H1543><s%> and the lower <S%H8482><s%> springs. <S%H1543><s%>
This is the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> according to their families. <S%H4940><s%>

The farthest <S%H7097><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> toward the border <S%H1366><s%> of Edom <S%H123><s%> in the South <S%H5045><s%> were Kabzeel, <S%H6909><s%> Eder, <S%H5740><s%> Jagur, <S%H3017><s%>
Kinah, <S%H7016><s%> Dimonah, <S%H1776><s%> Adadah, <S%H5735><s%>
Kedesh, <S%H6943><s%> Hazor, <S%H2674><s%> Ithnan, <S%H3497><s%>
Ziph, <S%H2128><s%> Telem, <S%H2928><s%> Bealoth, <S%H1175><s%>
Hazor <S%H2674><s%> Hadattah, <S%H2675><s%> Kerioth <S%H7152><s%> Hezron <S%H2696><s%> (the same is Hazor <S%H2674><s%>),
Amam, <S%H538><s%> Shema, <S%H8090><s%> Moladah, <S%H4137><s%>
Hazar Gaddah, <S%H2693><s%> Heshmon, <S%H2829><s%> Beth Pelet, <S%H1046><s%>
Hazar Shual, <S%H2705><s%> Beersheba, <S%H884><s%> Biziothiah, <S%H964><s%>
Baalah, <S%H1173><s%> Iim, <S%H5864><s%> Ezem, <S%H6107><s%>
Eltolad, <S%H513><s%> Chesil, <S%H3686><s%> Hormah, <S%H2767><s%>
Ziklag, <S%H6860><s%> Madmannah, <S%H4089><s%> Sansannah, <S%H5578><s%>
Lebaoth, <S%H3822><s%> Shilhim, <S%H7978><s%> Ain, <S%H5871><s%> and Rimmon. <S%H7417><s%> All the cities <S%H5892><s%> are twenty-nine, <S%H6242><s%> <S%H8672><s%> with their villages. <S%H2691><s%>
In the lowland, <S%H8219><s%> Eshtaol, <S%H847><s%> Zorah, <S%H6881><s%> Ashnah, <S%H823><s%>
Zanoah, <S%H2182><s%> En Gannim, <S%H5873><s%> Tappuah, <S%H8599><s%> Enam, <S%H5879><s%>
Jarmuth, <S%H3412><s%> Adullam, <S%H5725><s%> Socoh, <S%H7755><s%> Azekah, <S%H5825><s%>
Shaaraim, <S%H8189><s%> Adithaim <S%H5723><s%> and Gederah <S%H1449><s%> (or Gederothaim <S%H1453><s%>); fourteen <S%H702><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages. <S%H2691><s%>
Zenan, <S%H6799><s%> Hadashah, <S%H2322><s%> Migdal Gad, <S%H4028><s%>
Dilean, <S%H1810><s%> Mizpeh, <S%H4708><s%> Joktheel, <S%H3371><s%>
Lachish, <S%H3923><s%> Bozkath, <S%H1218><s%> Eglon, <S%H5700><s%>
Cabbon, <S%H3522><s%> Lahmam, <S%H3903><s%> Chitlish, <S%H3798><s%>
Gederoth, <S%H1450><s%> Beth Dagon, <S%H1016><s%> Naamah, <S%H5279><s%> and Makkedah; <S%H4719><s%> sixteen <S%H8337><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages. <S%H2691><s%>
Libnah, <S%H3841><s%> Ether, <S%H6281><s%> Ashan, <S%H6228><s%>
Iphtah, <S%H3316><s%> Ashnah, <S%H823><s%> Nezib, <S%H5334><s%>
Keilah, <S%H7084><s%> Achzib, <S%H392><s%> and Mareshah; <S%H4762><s%> nine <S%H8672><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages. <S%H2691><s%>
Ekron, <S%H6138><s%> with its towns <S%H1323><s%> and its villages; <S%H2691><s%>
from Ekron <S%H6138><s%> even to the sea, <S%H3220><s%> all that were by <S%H3027><s%> the side of Ashdod, <S%H795><s%> with their villages. <S%H2691><s%>

Ashdod, <S%H795><s%> its towns <S%H1323><s%> and its villages; <S%H2691><s%> Gaza, <S%H5804><s%> its towns <S%H1323><s%> and its villages; <S%H2691><s%> to the brook <S%H5158><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and the great <S%H1419><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%> with its coastline. <S%H1366><s%>
In the hill country, <S%H2022><s%> Shamir, <S%H8069><s%> Jattir, <S%H3492><s%> Socoh, <S%H7755><s%>
Dannah, <S%H1837><s%> Kiriath Sannah <S%H7158><s%> (which is Debir <S%H1688><s%>),
Anab, <S%H6024><s%> Eshtemoh, <S%H851><s%> Anim, <S%H6044><s%>
Goshen, <S%H1657><s%> Holon, <S%H2473><s%> and Giloh; <S%H1542><s%> eleven <S%H259><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages. <S%H2691><s%>
Arab, <S%H694><s%> Dumah, <S%H1746><s%> Eshan, <S%H824><s%>
Janim, <S%H3241><s%> Beth Tappuah, <S%H1054><s%> Aphekah, <S%H664><s%>
Humtah, <S%H2547><s%> Kiriath Arba <S%H7153><s%> (the same is Hebron <S%H2275><s%>), and Zior; <S%H6730><s%> nine <S%H8672><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages. <S%H2691><s%>
Maon, <S%H4584><s%> Carmel, <S%H3760><s%> Ziph, <S%H2128><s%> Jutah, <S%H3194><s%>
Jezreel, <S%H3157><s%> Jokdeam, <S%H3347><s%> Zanoah, <S%H2182><s%>
Kain, <S%H7014><s%> Gibeah, <S%H1390><s%> and Timnah; <S%H8553><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages. <S%H2691><s%>
Halhul, <S%H2478><s%> Beth Zur, <S%H1049><s%> Gedor, <S%H1446><s%>
Maarath, <S%H4638><s%> Beth Anoth, <S%H1042><s%> and Eltekon; <S%H515><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages. <S%H2691><s%>
Kiriath Baal <S%H7154><s%> (the same is Kiriath Jearim <S%H7157><s%>), and Rabbah; <S%H7237><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages. <S%H2691><s%>
In the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> Beth Arabah, <S%H1026><s%> Middin, <S%H4081><s%> Secacah, <S%H5527><s%>
Nibshan, <S%H5044><s%> the City of Salt, <S%H5898><s%> and En Gedi; <S%H5872><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages. <S%H2691><s%>

As for the Jebusites, <S%H2983><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> couldn't <S%H3201><s%> drive them out; <S%H3423><s%> but the Jebusites <S%H2983><s%> live <S%H3427><s%> with the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> at Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> to this day. <S%H3117><s%>
